imdb.plot outline: Join characters Bloop & Loop for bubbles of fun! In every episode, these friends use their imaginations to think of objects and living creatures. Then, Bloop & Loop take turns guessing what the other is imagining, and the shape is created by a whirlwind of bubbles!
imdb.title: Bloop and Loop
plot: Join characters Bloop & Loop for bubbles of fun! In every episode, these friends use their imaginations to think of objects and living creatures. Then, Bloop & Loop take turns guessing what the other is imagining, and the shape is created by a whirlwind of bubbles!
